string.value: #b#p9270058##k is lost in her thought. Her daddy's birthday is coming and she wants to give him something special this year.

#b#p9270058##k's daddy is a great fan of music, as well as a collector of all sorts of musical instruments. #b#t4000472##k might be the perfect birthday gift for him. 

#o9420534# #r#a45531##k 
#t4000472# #r#c4000472#/100#k
#b#p9270058##k's daddy was happy with the gift and he promised to take her out for a exquisite dinner.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 10,000 #Wbasic# #i2000005:# #t2000005:# 10 Able to proceed to 'Daddy's Birthday Party' as next quest.
Hmm...Daddy's birthday is coming and I want to give him something special this year. What would make him thrilled with joy and surprise?
I got it! Since he's such a huge fan of music and loves to collect all sorts of musical instruments, he would definitely love to have #b#t4000472##k as a gift.
But how can I collect #b100 #t4000472#s#k to make a whole collection for him in such a short time? Maybe you could help me with it!
Make sure you hunt #b100 #o9420534#s#k and bring back #b100 #t4000472#s#k. Only those collected from #b#o9420534##k are the authentic ones!
Without your help, I won't be able to surprise my daddy on his birthday.
Wow! This is just enough to make a full collection of #b#t4000472##k for my daddy. Thanks a bunch.
It would be the best birthday ever!
I really want to give a special gift for my daddy. Nothing is more perfect than a full collection of #b#t4000472##k.
